FDG.function_description: Launch page for services and search

core_logic.logic: The app starts on page 0, where users can click various service icons (like FRVR Games, KKday, etc.) to navigate to page 4 or 5. From page 4, users can click Home, Refresh, Search, or Menu buttons to go to page 0, 5, or 13. From page 5, Home, Refresh, or Menu buttons lead to page 0, 4, or 13. From page 13, Settings or Exit buttons return to page 4.

steps.summary: Click FRVR Games icon to go to page 4
Click KKday icon to go to page 5
Click Home button on page 4 to go to page 0
Click Refresh button on page 4 to go to page 5
Click Menu button on page 4 to go to page 13
Click Home icon button on page 5 to go to page 0
Click Refresh icon button on page 5 to go to page 4
Click Menu icon button on page 5 to go to page 13
Click Settings button on page 13 to go to page 4
Click Exit button on page 13 to go to page 4
